doc.field: Series I. Cultural, Social and Academic Organizations
Series I. Cultural, Social and Academic Organizations
Subseries IF: Glucksman Ireland House Records
Subseries IF: Glucksman Ireland House Records

This subseries contains materials documenting O'Malley's involvement in NYU's Glucksman Ireland House (GIH) during the years 1999-2014. Materials include correspondence with GIH donors, Irish Studies course syllabi and curriculum planning documentation, promotional material such as brochures and postcards, correspondence and memoranda concerning film and lecture events, correspondence concerning potential archival collections for the Archives of Irish America, and materials concerning the activities of the GIH Advisory Board, including correspondence, memoranda, and meeting minutes.
